graphics

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.Notification

  • public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    A small information box that appears at points in the game to give useful information.
    Author:
    Andrew J. Rigg, Cameron A. Craig, Euan Mutch, Duncan Robertson, Stuart Thain

    • Constructor Detail

      • Notification

        public Notification(java.lang.String text,
            java.awt.Color textColor,
            java.awt.Color backColor)
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be displayed in the notification box.
        textColor - The colour of the text in the notification box, also used for the box outline.
        backColor - The colour of the background of the box.

        public java.lang.String[] wrapStringToArray(java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        text - The text to wrap into an array of lines.
        Returns:
        An array of strings, each element of the array represents a line.
